header.title: Presentation & Video Guidelines
header.description: Follow these essential instructions to create and submit your presentation materials, including PowerPoint slides and a pre-recorded video, in compliance with IEEE conference standards. Ensure your content meets all technical and formatting requirements for a successful submission.

oral.title: Oral Presentation Guidelines
guidelines: Each paper is allocated 15 minutes: 12 minutes for presentation and 3 minutes for Q&A.
Presenters should be present in the session room at least 10 minutes before the start of the session.
Prepare your slides in PowerPoint (PPT/PPTX) or PDF format.
Aspect ratio of slides should be 16:9.
Bring your presentation on a USB flash drive.

video.title: Video Submission Guidelines
video.description: Virtual presenters are required to submit a pre-recorded video of their presentation.
instructions: Ensure clear audio and video quality.
The video should include the presenter's face (picture-in-picture) along with the slides.
